HTMLMediaElementDefaultMuted.summary: The HTMLMediaElement.defaultMuted property reflects the muted HTML attribute, which indicates whether the media element's audio output should be muted by default. This property has no dynamic effect. To mute and unmute the audio output, use the property.

remarks.para:
-: Interface used to define the HTMLMediaElement.defaultMuted property
-
-

HTMLMediaElementDefaultMuted.value: A boolean value. A value of true means that the audio output will be muted by default.
